summary: The diff implements most of the testimonials page requirements successfully. A new Testimonials component was created with bilingual support, current students and alumni sections with avatar images, and proper styling. The component was integrated into App.tsx. However, the SubmitReview component update (REQ-61) is not evidenced in the diff summary, and the component placement in App.tsx appears incorrect (Testimonials before Gallery instead of before SubmitReview).

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the existing SubmitReview component to match the testimonials page specification with header 'Share Your Experience!', subtitle 'We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.', form fields (Full Name required, Class/Year required, Subject(s) Studied optional, Review textarea required, Rating 1-5 stars optional), Submit Review button, and confirmation message 'Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.' with bilingual support
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any modifications to the SubmitReview component. Only Testimonials.tsx was added and App.tsx was modified, but no evidence of SubmitReview.tsx being updated with the new header, subtitle, or success message.

hallucinated_features.description: Testimonials component placed before Gallery instead of before SubmitReview
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-62 explicitly requires 'Component is positioned after TeachersNotes section and before SubmitReview component', but the App.tsx diff shows the order as TeachersNotes → Testimonials → Gallery → SubmitReview, which places Testimonials before Gallery instead of immediately before SubmitReview.
